name: SURVIVE OR DIE(Pre-Alpha)
description:
This game is brought to you by Devil Studios. It features an interactive enviroment in which you can roam around. it has 

>  Small Test Map 

> Physics included 

> Animated Characters 

>targets for shooting 

We will include more content in updates . Hope you will enjoy:) . 

{ Please note that this is only the pre-alpha version 1.0 . it will be updated soon  . Please do not be abusive in the reviews . Constructive criticism is welcome}
